item.description:
Developing Your Intuition

Learn to Develop and Trust Your Intuitive Self. Tell the difference between the mind and doubt and truer intuitive knowing and learn methods to increase intuition.

Sliding scale $15-30

99 Crescent St., Newton, msarndt@verizon.net
6:00 fabulous macrobiotic dinner with dessert, $20-35 or $5 for separate dessert
*Email msarndt@verizon.net or call 617 964 2951 to reserve for the meal by early afternoon*

7-9pm, workshop

Herb Pearce, M.Ed., is the author of The Idiot's Guide to the Enneagram and a leading expert on the Enneagram, with close to 20 years experience teaching the Enneagram and other personality systems like the Myers-Briggs. He is a psychotherapist in Arlington, MA, a personal coach, workshop leader, organizational trainer. He is writing his second book on Herb's Tips for Living.

www.herbpearce.com
herb@herbpearce.com
781 648 3737
also www.meetup.com/The-Arlington-Singles-Events
item.name: Developing Your Intuition
